20101211060924.000|20101211060926.000|CCO|ONE IF I DIE IN FLIGHT, EITHER 
20101211060926.000|20101211060928.000|CCO|DARKEST DAY.

20101211062605.000|20101211062607.000|CCO|TO KEEP UP WITH THE SEA'S 
20101211062607.000|20101211062609.000|CCO|FASTEST SWIMMERS.

20101211062611.000|20101211062613.000|CCO|HANNAH WAS A YOUNG GIRL IN 
20101211062613.000|20101211062615.000|CCO|AUSTRALIA.

20101211062617.000|20101211062619.000|CCO|WAS NINE YEARS OLD.
